== Calvim (626685) ==

Calvim is a village in the [[Bardez]] taluka of [[North Goa]] district with an area of 135.01 hectares and harbouring 113 households with total population of 403 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[MAPUSA]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 180 and female population is 223. Scheduled Caste Population is 0 and Scheduled Tribes population is 20. Census Location Code of the village is 626685<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
